text: Giorgio Morales (26 March 1932 â€“ 29 November 2020) was an Italian politician and activist. He was Mayor of Florence from 2 October 1989 to 24 April 1995. He was a member of both Socialist and Forza Italia. Morales was born in La Spezia, Italy. Morales died on 29 November 2020 from pneumonia-related problems in Florence, aged 88.E' morto l'ex sindaco Giorgio Morales ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Florence Category:Italian mayors Category:People from La Spezia
title: Giorgio Morales
